summary: Adds 113 new colors to: eyeliner, eye tint, eye shadow, lips, and war paint.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Dart98Rock.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/File-Description.jpg[/img]
DartsMakeUpColors adds the 113 colors of DartsHairColors to: Warpaint, Eye Tint, Eyeliner, Eye Shadow, and Lips. The colors are set to the following vanilla races: Breton, Dark Elf, High Elf, Imperial, Nord, Orc, Redguard, and Wood Elf. The colors are also only set to vanilla war paint. If you use a custom race or war paint, I made a tutorial that shows how to add the colors to the custom races and war paint. You do not need any previous experience in the Creation Kit to follow the tutorial. The colors are the same as for DartHairColors, there are for variations of colors: Normal, Lightened, Darkened, and Neon.
Abbreviations:
No = Normal
Ln = Lightened
Dn = Darkened
Ne = Neon

--Main Files--
-Dart\'sMakeUpColorsAll, has all variations of colors (No, Ln, Dn, Ln).
-Dart\'sMakeUpColorsNormal, has only the normal variation.
-Dart\'sMakeUpColorsLightened, has only the lightened variation.
-Dart\'sMakeUpColorsDarkened, has only the darkened variation.
-Dart\'sMakeUpColorsNeon, has only the neon variation.

--Optional Files--
-Dart\'s_Hair-MakeUpColors_All, combination file of Dart\'sMakeUpColors and DartHairColors. Has all of the colors including the natural colors for DartHairColors.
-Dart\'s_Hair-MakeUpColors-PalerRaces, combination of all three of my mods: Dart\'sMakeUpColors, DartHairColors, and Paler Races. Has all of the colors including the natural colors for DartHairColors.
-Tutorial, a .pdf file that has the tutorial to add the colors to custom races.

Show your support by sharing your images and commenting.
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Compadibility.jpg[/img]
Is not compatible with any other mod that adds color forms, such as hair color or tints.

[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Installation.jpg[/img]
Unpack the .rar archive files using either WinRar or 7zip. Then drag and drop the esp file into your Skyrim data folder.
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Bugs.jpg{/img}
The only thing I have noticed is when going into the race menu it sets all tints and colors back to default.
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/ModsUsedInScreenShots.jpg[/img]
